name: OCWFrance
description:
CERIMES (Centre de ressources et d'information sur les multimédias pour l'enseignement supérieur): Centre of resources and information about multimedia for higher education

Founded by a decree of August 17th, 2005, CERIMES succeeds SFRS, Service of films of scientific
research, which was created in 1954. 

It is a service of the French Ministry of higher education and research.

CERIMES aims are:

a) To facilitate the access of teachers, researchers and students of higher education to multimedia
resources and help them to integrate them into education;
b) Co-produce audiovisual or multimedia materials at the request of teachers and researchers;
c) Inform about e-learning, specifically for distance learning in higher education.

Main actions of the CERIMES:

Publisher and Manager of Canal-U (digital video library for higher education and research -
www.canal-u.fr; Publisher and Manager of Formasup, www.formasup.education.fr/ the catalogue of
distance training in French higher education; Publisher and Manager of the portal of the UNT ((Universités Numériques Thématiques ≈ digital thematic universities) http://www.universitesnumeriques.fr/; Publisher and Manager of http://www.signets-universites.fr/ ; Publisher and Manager of http://bibnum.education.fr/ fundamental scientific texts with commentaries by contemporary scientists and CERIMES also offers services of an image library. CERIMES coproduces audiovisual and multimedia documents, mainly for the UNT (Universités Numériques Thématiques ≈ digital thematic universities). Their annual reports, in French, are on line:
http://www.cerimes.fr/le-cerimes/rapports-dactivite.html
